description:
Update 5.1.0 added DOW S&P and NASDAQ Widget.
Tap in the widget to see if they gained or lost for the day.

fix the RSS feeds. You can tap on the header to see full info.

App resets its self about every minute or two to keep you up to date as the stock market changes. Or just hit the "Reset Page" button to update too.

Stock Portfolio is a simple and easy to use app.
Type in a Stock Symbol and add it to the list.
The app uses local-storage to store all the stocks you  add.

As you search for a stock, you will get some help as you type. A list of symbols generate below in a popup for faster look-up.

At the top of the app you have two widgets. 
Top 10 Gainers and Losers that scroll across the screen.

To the left of the app you have a list of stocks that you added.
Click on any of them and a stock info screen will pop-up with info about the stock you picked.

To the right of the app you have four RSS feed boxes that scroll information related to the stock market form CNN Money.
